measurements.description: Six flowers and one bud on seven 17-cm inflorescences; flowers magenta, gold caudae, dorsal cauda 4.8cm, lateral caudae 3.0cm, dorsal sepal lighter magneta, lateral sepals intense magenta, dark purple veins; petals minute, purple; lip purple; column white; substance very firm; texture velvet.
